$core_v2_page.AddLink('stylesheet', $core_v2_widget.GetExecutedFileUrl('style.less'), "%{ Position = 'AfterTheme' }") #set($group = $core_v2_group.Current) #set($uploadContextId = $core_v2_uploadedFile.CreateContextId()) #set($adminDefault = false) #set($adminDefault = $core_v2_page.GetQueryStringValue('_cpdefault')) #if ($adminDefault) $core_v2_widget.Hide() #end #if ($group.ParentGroupId <= 0) #set($group = false) #if($core_v2_urls.Current != 'Home') $core_v2_widget.Hide() #end #else #if ($core_v2_groupUrls.Current != 'Group') $core_v2_widget.Hide() #end #end #registerEndOfPageHtml('telligent.evolution.widgets.siteAndGroupSetup') #end #registerEndOfPageHtml() #end #if(!$group) #set($groups = $core_v2_group.List("%{ParentGroupId=$core_v2_group.Root.Id, PageSize=2, PageIndex=1}")) #if ($core_v2_page.IsInDeveloperMode)
$core_v2_language.GetResource('DeveloperModeEnabled')
#elseif (!$core_v2_page.IsInThemePreviewMode && ($groups.TotalCount > 1 || ($groups.TotalCount == 1 && !$groups.get_Item(0).Name.StartsWith('Admin')))) ## site already configured, register script to clean up page #registerEndOfPageHtml() #end #elseif ($core_v3_permission.CheckPermission($core_v2_sitePermissions.ModifyTheme, $core_v2_user.Accessing.Id).IsAllowed && $core_v3_permission.CheckPermission($core_v2_sitePermissions.ManageSettings, $core_v2_user.Accessing.Id).IsAllowed) ## site not configured, user has access, show configuration form $core_v2_widget.ExecuteFile('setup-new-site.vm') #else ## not configured but the accessing user can't edit
$core_v2_language.GetResource('LoginToSetupSite')
#end #else #set($hasApps = false) #set ($apps = $core_v2_blog.List("%{GroupId=$group.Id,PageIndex=0,PageSize=1,IncludeSubGroups='True'}")) #if ($apps && $apps.TotalCount > 0) #set($hasApps = true) #else #set ($apps = $core_v2_forum.List("%{GroupId=$group.Id,PageIndex=0,PageSize=1,IncludeSubGroups='True'}")) #if ($apps && $apps.TotalCount > 0) #set($hasApps = true) #else #set($apps = $core_v2_gallery.List("%{GroupId=$group.Id,PageIndex=0,PageSize=1,IncludeSubGroups='True'}")) #if ($apps && $apps.TotalCount > 0) #set($hasApps = true) #else #set($apps = $core_v2_wiki.List("%{GroupId=$group.Id,PageIndex=0,PageSize=1,IncludeSubGroups='True'}")) #if ($apps && $apps.TotalCount > 0) #set($hasApps = true) #else #set($apps = $articles_v1_articleCollections.List("%{GroupId=$group.Id,PageIndex=0,PageSize=1,IncludeSubGroups='True'}")) #if ($apps && $apps.TotalCount > 0) #set($hasApps = true) #else #set($apps = $telligentIdeas_v1_challenges.List($group.Id, "%{IncludeSubGroups='True',PageIndex=0,PageSize=1}")) #if ($apps && $apps.TotalCount > 0) #set($hasApps = true) #end ## can't get a calendar for a group :( #end #end #end #end #end #if (!$core_v2_page.IsInThemePreviewMode && $hasApps) ## group already configured, register script to clean up page #registerEndOfPageHtml() #end #elseif ($core_v3_permission.CheckPermission($core_v2_groupPermissions.EditTheme, $core_v2_user.Accessing.Id, "%{ ApplicationId = $group.ApplicationId, ApplicationTypeId = $core_v2_group.ApplicationTypeId }").IsAllowed && $core_v3_permission.CheckPermission($core_v2_groupPermissions.ModifyGroup, $core_v2_user.Accessing.Id, "%{ ApplicationId = $group.ApplicationId, ApplicationTypeId = $core_v2_group.ApplicationTypeId }").IsAllowed) ## group not configured, user has access, show configuration form $core_v2_widget.ExecuteFile('setup-new-group.vm') #else ## not configured but the accessing user can't edit
$core_v2_language.GetResource('LoginToSetupGroup')
#end #end
